name: Deeplearning with Blobby
description:
Here is a new version of the game which should have all bugs fixed. However, since this version was built 7 hours after the WOWIE JAM deadline it cannot be rated. However, we cannot upload anything here as long as the jam lasts, so we are forced to upload the file like this. Everyone who wants to rate the game because of the WOWIE JAM should take the file in the Download section.

New Version: 
https://www.mediafire.com/file/py3p5bae7l12ngs/Deeplearning_with_Blobby.zip/file

Deeplearning with Blobby is a little game made for the WOWIE Jam 4.0, where we were given the Theme "Collaborate with AI", we decided to make a game about teaching Blobby, a nanobot in the newest generation harddrives to avoid obstacles, get through different sections of the circuit boards bring the data he's given at the beginning  to it's destination
